reviewText: Amazing...this is pure drama, emotion, action and a little comedy.  These bums did their Christian duties and entertained us.  Donald Trump would be proud of this level of humanity.
I loved it,  it really shows the true life of a bum
This dvd is hard to find. Pretty nasty and funny at times. Worth watching at least once. I recommend it.

The makers of this film are evil, they take advantage of homeless people. They get them to pull teeth out for a dollar, these people need help some are mental or addicts, but they can sometimes be saved! They need guidance and help off drugs etc not humiliation. The makers of this film have made millions and brag about it. If you buy this you are supporting evil.

Amazon you are disgusting for promoting this evil on your website, you might as well sell rape videos and snuff films too. I may boycott amazon now after seeing this here.

This movie is horrible and you cant even watch more than 60 seconds without becoming physically ill and crying. These people take advantage of people (thats an extreme understatement) devastated by poverty and/or addiction. I sincerely hope these people are hung upside down for 12 hours and tortured in various creative ways until finally having their throat slit.
